name: Tor går och fiskar
description:
One day, Thor went fishing with the giant Hymir. Hymir refused to provide Thor with bait, so Thor decapitated Hymirs biggest Ox and used the head as bait. They went far out to sea, and when Thor casted his line, who took the bait, but Jörmungandr, the Midgard Serpent itself! 

When Jörmungandr releases its tail from its mouth, it is said to be a sign of Ragnarök, and there is where Thor and Jörmungandr will have their last battle. 

This is that story. 

Controls: 

Hold [SPACE] to cast your line

Press the left and right arrow keys to pull the line to the green part of the bar to reel in the snake
